relation: new config option: propose what to do
make it possible to replay a game from a screen shot (for better debugging)
Players can chat with each other from within kajongg
Define a central game server, making it easier to play over the internet (no more tweaking of firewalls for the server side)
Add support for other rule variants, starting with Classical Chinese variants
Print rulesets, also more than one in parallel for comparisons
Add the Gold Rush II championship game (20 levels), contributed by Gabriel Miltschitzky
Add solution files to some KGoldrunner games, possibly using Get Hot New Stuff
Simplify the XML descriptions of puzzle shapes
Add XML and Desktop files for seven new two-dimensional puzzle shapes
Add XML and Desktop files for three new three-dimensional puzzle shapes
Improve the quality and relevance of KSudoku hints
Make Load and Save work correctly for all puzzle types, including display of small markers/notes and restart of the puzzle clock from a saved value
Integrate the new generator/solver and the old KSudoku code more closely
Make puzzle features easier to see and use by improving highlighting, control and settings in both 2-D and 3-D puzzles and adding keyboard input to 3-D puzzles
